title: Atmospheric aerosol chemistry and source apportionment of PM10 using stable carbon isotopes and PMF modelling during fireworks over Hyderabad, southern India
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Pradeep Attri, Devleena Mani, M. Satyanarayanan, D.V. Reddy, Devender Kumar, Siddhartha Sarkar, Sanjeev Kumar, Prashant Hegde
